Name: Tequila Sunset
Ingredients: 25 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir
Review: A good sweet and sour balance with tequila character seemingly boosted by the honey.
Nutrition: One serving of Tequila Sunset contains 197 calories
